caption:
Struggling with your nail art?  If the answer is YES, then investing in your art brush collection could be the missing piece for nailing those spring details!
 
Our current spring art faves are:

⭐️ Kokoist Round Brush - Perfect for product application, large petals or large abstract swipes.

⭐️ Kokoist Mini Round - Ideal brush for smaller petals, leaves and smaller nail beds that require more detailed brushes.

⭐️ Kokoist Longer Skinny Liner Brush -Precise Long lines and long stripes are a breeze with this brush!

⭐️ Kokoist Long Liner Brush - Great for long, skinny lines, fine details and French tips.

⭐️ Akzentz Art 3: Great for smaller details, 3D art and lines.

⭐️ Kokoist Short Liner Brush: Amazing tool for small details, vines, stems.

⭐️ Kokoist Needle Liner: The PERFECT brush for the smallest, tiniest details!

Every Kokoist brush features soft and flexible bristles and made with PBT fiber. Handcrafted by talented artisans in Kumano, Japan, these brushes are made with the finest attention to details and materials.

Each of these brushes also come with a cap to keep them clean and free from debris and dust when not in use. 

And to help keep these babies in great condition, don’t forget to add the Kokoist Brush Cleansing Gel.  These brushes are an investment and meant to last you for YEARS, so make sure you use the proper cleanser to for optimal care.

Ready level up your art game? Then click the link in our bio or shop our profile!  #ericasata #nailart #nailartist #nailbrushes #kokoist #springnails #springnailart
